= Pascal Module Compiler (PMC) =

What PMC does is to compile directly a free-pascal unit file to a lysee module.

By the time, PMC is packed in _*lysee_pmc*_, a standalone console program.

== 1. PMC Usage ==

|| *usage* || *description ||
|| lysee_pmc _*pasunit.pas*_ || generate _*pasunit_m.pas*_, wraping pasunit.pas as a lysee module ||
|| lysee_pmc -o_*pasunit.dll*_ _*pasunit.pas*_ || compile pasunit.pas to lysee module _*pasunit.dll*_ ||
